content: this legal text summarizes the progress of a legal case involving the division of an estate the court located in ljubljana made a decision regarding the inheritance case the deceased person had various assets including funds in bank accounts royalty payments material copyright a car unpaid pension funds real estate and works of art the court determined that the estate would be divided equally between the deceased persons granddaughter and grandson the court also stated that any copyrights and benefits from the estate would be divided equally among the heirs the court validated the declaration made by the deceased person appointing their grandchildren as heirs the estate will be divided equally between the two heirs and the court will register the final order of succession the net value of the estate is estimated to be 673998 eur the heirs are responsible for paying a court fee of 1728 eur an appeal was deemed inadmissible and the heirs decided not to pursue it a succession hearing took place on march 25 2022 and an order was issued on the same day which has now become final
